Package com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.event

Interface Summary
EventCompletionListener Denotes a class that listens for status resulting from processing of events.
EventDispatcher Denotes a class that can dispatch events to a state machine.
OutOfBandEvent Denotes an event that should always be submitted out-of-band.
 

Class Summary
EventDispatcherTask This class defines an event dispatcher task, which is a separate thread that dispatches events to a listener from a queue.
EventProcessor Submits an event to the state machine with logging and sets the status.
EventRequest Defines an event request, which contains the event to be processed as well as the status of it.
EventStatus Defines the status of processing an event in the state machine.
